title: The Breath of life
creator_credit: Ampol Petroleum Ltd, Visatone (Australia) and Bewick Hack
brief_description: Stresses the importance of mouth to mouth or mouth to nose resuscitation in cases of apparent drowning, suffocation and electric shock. Shows how these conditions may occur, and demonstrates resuscitation technique.
creator_credit_for_label: Ampol Petroleum Ltd, Visatone (Australia) and Bewick Hack
description: Stresses the importance of mouth to mouth or mouth to nose resuscitation in cases of apparent drowning, suffocation and electric shock. Shows how these conditions may occur, and demonstrates resuscitation technique.
